meanings: have a thorough grasp[grip] of the problem

vlive.korean: [동맹이든 뭐든 철저히 경계하는 특 대형 필릭스] 너 그렇게 나를 못 믿냐? You can't trust me that much? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : [FULL] <찾았다 스트레이 키즈> 1화
vlive.english: You can't trust me that much?

vlive.korean: [준비는 철저히] A 파트에 무조건 맞추지 말고... [Thorough preparation] Don't coordinate at the A part... 듣기 View video Mnet : [ONE DREAM.TXT] Reality Ep.04 - Part.2
vlive.english: [Thorough preparation] Don't coordinate at the A part...

vlive.korean: 무조건 책을 보기 위한 준비를 철저히 한대요. He says he always gets ready to read books. 듣기 View video MOMO X : [모모문고] 형섭X의웅 이의웅 편

vlive.korean: [철저히 달방 시상식 기준!] 궁금한 게 이게 시상 기준이 뭐예요? [Run BTS has their own standards!] How were the candidates chosen? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2018 - EP.50
vlive.english: [Run BTS has their own standards!] How were the candidates chosen?

vlive.korean: 모든 일을 했었을 때 사전 계획을 철저히 해놓고 하는 게 좋다고 생각합니다. For every action you take, I think it's best to have a very detailed plan beforehand. 듣기 View video INFINITE : INFINITE "김명수의 TALK N TALK"
vlive.english: For every action you take, I think it's best to have a very detailed plan beforehand.

examples.korean: We thoroughly enjoyed our time in New York. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 뉴욕에서 보내는 시간을 철저히 즐겼다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
